channel.title: Brandon Rohrer
channel.description: Brandon Rohrer's blog, articles, and books

item.title: Making Animations with Matplotlib: How to Train Your Robot, Chapter 4
item.description: Chapter four is all about how to make moving pictures. It's entertaining, yes, but it's also a very good way to represent complex data that changes over time. It also happens to be a great companion to games and simulations, which is exactly how we'll be using it a few chapters later.

item.title: Getting Processes to Talk to Each Other: How to Train Your Robot, Chapter 3
item.description: In this chapter we get to build an adding machine. It is exactly as fascinating as it sounds.

item.title: Keeping Time with Python: How to Train Your Robot, Chapter 2
item.description: The second installment in a quest to build a robot as smart as my pup.

item.title: How to Train Your Robot, Chapter 1
item.description: The first chapter of a book that builds a solution to the Human Directed Reinforcement Learning (HDRL) problem, more commonly known as teaching a dog to sit. It's titled Can't Artificial Intelligence Already Do That

item.title: Transformers From Scratch
item.description: A step-by-step walkthrough of transformers, the algorithm behind Large Language Models like ChatGPT.

item.title: Homepage
item.description: A list of what I've written.
